title: The.X.Files.S03E01.The.Blessing.Way.DVDRip.XVID-neocon80.avi.avi
description:
"The Blessing Way" is the third season premiere of television series The X-Files. Mulder is nursed back to health by a group of Navajo following an explosion in a train. Meanwhile, Scully, still believing herself responsible for Mulder&#039;s supposed death, faces possible expulsion from the FBI. The episode comes to a climax when it seems that Mulder&#039;s own superior, Assistant FBI Director Skinner (Mitch Pileggi), is part of a sinister conspiracy. Part two of a three-part story, "The Blessing Way" was written by series creator Chris Carter. ~ Hal Erickson, All Movie Guide


The title refers to a Navajo ceremony called "the Blessing Way."
